text: <@UBV0Z50DA> I had this issue also but with a post listing in a module. It seems to have been one of the things affected by the bugs in HubSpot that started on the 28th. We got the custom-title and custom-choice fields to show and working with the HubL you shared. Try again today and it just might've worked itself out.
It works in a module but not a weekly blog summary email. Were you able to get it to work with the blog summary email?
